CatDescriptText: Cutline for image (or 2001.35.45902) published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 9, 1957, pg. 2, reads: "Jim Crow in Pittsburgh? - Sponsors of the Pittsburgh Junior Academy, a Seventh-Day Adventist school, have been accused of discriminating by refusing to enroll Negro children of their faith. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Junior Academy, Seventh-Day Adventist school, 6055 Jackson Street, Highland Park
